input.sentences: i was super excited to see the phantom lights .
i was prepared to camp out and wait .
but luckily i was n't alone .
my paranormal group was ready for some action .
output.sentences: My family was super excited to see the northern lights, which some people said were phantom.
We prepared for the opportunity by setting up a camp to wait for darkness to come.
During the day, it rained and boy, was it cold.
Luckily, we came with rain clothes to help us stay dry.
We were ready for the lights, and maybe even some paranormal action.
